Overview of Project¶

This app allows users to improve their media literacy by taking a critical eye towards what news items are forwarded to them in a quick, informative dashboard.

This “one-stop shop” will automate cross-checking for quick verification and provide a more complex approach of machine learning as an option, so they can understand why and how to verify digital information.

Features¶

  1. Article validity analyzer: Machine-learning-based analysis of URL and text

  2. Automated Mike Caulfield’s SIFT method of checking a source :

    (Stop; Investigate the source; Find better coverage; Trace claims, quotes and media to the original context)
